section.p:
You camp for the night.
If you have a wolf pelt or fur cloak, the fur helps to keep you warm.
If you do not, lose 1 Stamina from the cold.

You need to hunt for food. .
If you succeed, you find some voles to eat.
If you fail, you go hungry and must lose 1 Stamina point.
If you still live, the next day dawns.

choices.choice: Head west deeper into the steppes
